mapper.select: select id, sys_type, unit_type, case_bucket, salary_bucket, avatar_bucket, storage_bucket, comment from sys_file_config where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_file_config(sys_type, unit_type, case_bucket, salary_bucket, avatar_bucket, storage_bucket, comment) values (#{sysType}, #{unitType}, #{caseBucket}, #{salaryBucket}, #{avatarBucket}, #{storageBucket}, #{comment})

insert into sys_file_config(sys_type, unit_type, case_bucket, salary_bucket, avatar_bucket, storage_bucket, comment) values
(#{entity.sysType}, #{entity.unitType}, #{entity.caseBucket}, #{entity.salaryBucket}, #{entity.avatarBucket}, #{entity.storageBucket}, #{entity.comment})

insert into sys_file_config(sys_type, unit_type, case_bucket, salary_bucket, avatar_bucket, storage_bucket, comment) values
(#{entity.sysType}, #{entity.unitType}, #{entity.caseBucket}, #{entity.salaryBucket}, #{entity.avatarBucket}, #{entity.storageBucket}, #{entity.comment})
on duplicate key update sys_type = values(sys_type), unit_type = values(unit_type), case_bucket = values(case_bucket), salary_bucket = values(salary_bucket), avatar_bucket = values(avatar_bucket), storage_bucket = values(storage_bucket), comment = values(comment)
mapper.update:
update sys_file_config
sys_type = #{sysType},
unit_type = #{unitType},
case_bucket = #{caseBucket},
salary_bucket = #{salaryBucket},
avatar_bucket = #{avatarBucket},
storage_bucket = #{storageBucket},
comment = #{comment},
where id = #{id}
